name: Battle Rush Royale
description:
Welcome to the worst version of the world. What happened? Just an ordinary nuclear war, which made everything (and everyone) seem and act veeeeeery unfriendly. All the creatures are trying to stay alive as long as possible in this new post-apocalyptic world. Will you survive?

Here’s what we like the best:
⁃ Unique heroes — each character has his own set of skills to match the style of playing you prefer;
⁃ Atmospheric post-apocalyptic world: toxic waste, explosions, wild animals all the stuff;
⁃ Not-so-dumb mobs: they have a behavior of their own and can challenge you like real;
⁃ Character’s upgrades during the session;
⁃ Weapon’s upgrades too, the higher you’re in the rating, the better item you get and customize it;
⁃ Rare items are literally falling from the sky! keep an eye on them and on the airdrop map.

If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback - contact us andrew.tsaplin@gmail.com or https://discord.gg/kyK8zwc
